channel.title: zq on Noboru Saito's page
channel.description: Recent content in zq on Noboru Saito's page

item.title: Another way to aggregate json(jq + SQL)
item.description: Aggregate json with trdsql I agree that the aggregation of jq described in the Introducing zq is not easy. I’ve seen A Practical Example of zq, zq was not easy for me. SQL is not easy for everyone, but it is a language that many people can use. I am one of them. Of course, it is difficult to process all JSON with SQL. But what about using them in combination?
